Name: Ares Capital Corporation
Description: Ares Capital Corporation (ARCC) stands as one of the premier publicly traded business development companies (BDCs) in the United States, specializing in delivering tailored financing solutions to middle-market enterprises across a multitude of sectors. The firm utilizes a dynamic investment approach, balancing both debt and equity investments, to achieve sustainable risk-adjusted returns for its investors. With a well-diversified portfolio backed by disciplined credit assessment practices, Ares Capital is committed to capital preservation while seizing growth opportunities within the private equity landscape. Leveraging the global presence and extensive resources of its parent company, Ares Management Corporation, ARCC enhances its investment strategy and solidifies its competitive edge within the market.
Address: 1800 AVENUE OF THE STARS, LOS ANGELES, CA, UNITED STATES, 90067-4733
